issue.title: [IR] Add projection list to Source node
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14351](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14351). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`Source` should store a list of columns to read, so that consumers can prune columns and push projections all the way down to the source.
